title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Product Listing:

Introducing the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors. This premium product is designed to effectively repel snakes and a wide range of other animals from your outdoor spaces. 

Using ultrasonic technology, this snake repellent emits a sonic pulse every 30 seconds, covering an impressive area of 7000 square feet. The solar-powered device ensures maximum durability and convenience, as it harnesses the power of the sun to operate. With a waterproof rating of IP44, you can trust that this repellent will withstand various weather conditions.

Not only is this product highly effective, but it is also safe for children and pets. It is completely chemical-free, making it an environmentally friendly choice. The suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent is also capable of repelling additional animals such as deers, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels.

With a repellent effectiveness time of 2-4 weeks, you can rest assured that your outdoor spaces will remain snake-free for a significant period. The operational instructions are straightforward, requiring an initial charge time of 4-5 hours and an installation height of 2 inches above the soil.

For optimal performance, it is recommended to turn on the device before sun exposure to ensure a full charge. 

Don't let snakes and other unwanted animals invade your outdoor spaces. Invest in the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors and enjoy a safe and animal-free environment.

**Product Listing:**

Introducing the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors! This premium-quality snake repellent utilizes ultrasonic technology to keep your outdoor areas free from unwanted snakes. With a coverage of 7000 square feet, you can protect a large area with ease.

The suphanlin Snake Repellent emits ultrasonic waves every 30 seconds, creating a deterrent for snakes and other unwanted animals. The solar-powered device is both eco-friendly and cost-effective, as it harnesses the power of the sun to operate. It has a waterproof rating of IP44, ensuring durability and long-lasting performance even in wet conditions.

Safety is a top priority, and this snake repellent is safe for both children and pets. It is chemical-free, making it a non-toxic alternative to traditional snake repellents. In addition to snakes, it also repels a wide range of animals, including deers, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels.

The suphanlin Snake Repellent is highly effective, with a repellent effectiveness time of 2-4 weeks. Its sonic pulse interval of 3-4 seconds and frequency of 400+/-100Hz create a powerful deterrent for snakes and other animals.

For optimal performance, follow the usage instructions provided. The initial charge time is 4-5 hours, and the recommended installation height is 2 inches above the soil. To ensure a full charge, turn on the device before exposing it to sunlight.

Keep your outdoor spaces snake-free with the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors. Order now and enjoy a peaceful and snake-free environment!

Product Name: Suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors

The Suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors is a premium quality snake repellent that uses ultrasonic technology to keep snakes and other unwanted animals away from your outdoor space. With a coverage of 7000 square feet, this repellent is perfect for large outdoor areas.

- Additional repellent properties for deers, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels

Tips:

With the Suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors, you can create a snake-free and animal-free outdoor environment without the use of harmful chemicals. Enjoy peace of mind while spending time in your garden, yard, or any outdoor space.
